presentation.name: Mathias Micheli
presentation.title: Fullstack Developper
presentation.text: I create this website by myself with AngularJS. I will use it as a portfolio. Enjoy !

cv.text: Autonomous and versatile developer, I know how to integrate myself into a group already in place thanks to my team spirit. I am ready to put all my skills at your service while continuing my training as a web developer. Available, I am at your disposal to meet you in order to prove my motivations and explain my journey to you.
